SELECT p.no no, p.explorer_no explorerNo, p.title title, p.content content, p.category_type categoryType, p.regdate regdate, e.email email, e.nickname nickname, e.profile profile, e.score score,
(SELECT COUNT(l.no) FROM likes l WHERE p.no = l.content_no AND l.content_type='P') as countLikes, (SELECT count(c.no) FROM comments c WHERE p.no = c.post_no ) as countComments, (SELECT count(*) FROM views v WHERE p.no = v.post_no ) as countViews FROM posts p left join explorers e on p.explorer_no = e.no WHERE p.no = #{no}
